import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react'; import { TaskContext } from './Context/TaskContext'; // Import the context import '../App.scss'; function AddNewTask() { // State to track form inputs const [taskName, setTaskName] = useState(''); const [priority, setPriority] = useState(''); const [deadline, setDeadline] = useState(''); const [description, setDescription] = useState(''); // Access TaskContext to update the tasks const { addTask } = useContext(TaskContext); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Prevent form from reloading the page // Create task object const newTask = { taskName, priority, deadline, description, }; // Add task using the context method addTask(newTask); // Clear form inputs after submission setTaskName(''); setPriority(''); setDeadline(''); setDescription(''); }; return ( <>
setTaskName(e.target.value)} placeholder="Task Name..." required />

Priority:

setPriority(e.target.value)} /> setPriority(e.target.value)} /> setPriority(e.target.value)} />
setDeadline(e.target.value)} required />
); } export default AddNewTask;
